mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OHLCV (isin, s_date, open, high, low, close, volume, amount, updown) VALUES (#{isin}, #{s_date}, #{open}, #{high}, #{low}, #{close}, #{volume}, #{amount}, #{updown})
mapper.select: select * from ohlcv where isin = #{isin} and s_date = #{date}
SELECT s.isin, s.name FROM stock s JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ohlcv WHERE s_date = #{date} ORDER BY UPDOWN DESC ) o ON s.isin = o.isin WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT s.isin, s.name FROM stock s JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ohlcv WHERE s_date = '20230712' ORDER BY UPDOWN ASC ) o ON s.isin = o.isin WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT s.isin, s.name FROM stock s JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ohlcv WHERE s_date = '20230712' ORDER BY VOLUME DESC ) o ON s.isin = o.isin WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT s.isin, s.name FROM stock s JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ohlcv WHERE s_date = '20230712' ORDER BY AMOUNT DESC ) o ON s.isin = o.isin WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
